text: Check the sand around you. (Maybe you weren't the only thing to wash up over here...)
Walk to the flotsam (There's got to be something over there to help you out...)
Head into the jungle (Perhaps I'll be able to build a raft...)
Gather driftwood to burn.  (Wood should burn for a long time...)
Gather palm leaves and tall grass to burn.  (Foliage should ignite quickly...)
Light it now. (Perhaps some plane or helicopter will see you...)
Light it later.  (I shouldn’t waste the fuel now with nightfall so close...)
Light it now. (Perhaps some plane or helicopter will see you...)
Light it later.  (I shouldn’t waste the fuel now with nightfall so close...)
Check the crates.  (There's got to be something useful in one of these...)
Check the barrels.  (Surely one of these has water in it...)
Gather the bamboo stalks.  (Surely these’ll float, right?...)
Gather the branches.  (Most boats are made of wood...)
